advancement.numismatics.is_this_legal.de:
以低于其价值的价格购买硬币
§7(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.numismatics.money_laundering:
在供应商那里买硬币
§7(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.numismatics.questionable_inv:
以高于其价值的价格购买硬币
§7(Hidden Advancement)
block.numismatics.andesite_depositor.too: _Shift click_ the _top_ to configure, _right click_ to pay the given amount either with either the card or coins in your hand, at which point a redstone pulse is emmited.
Allows you to access your own bank account or any account you are _Trusted_ with.
block.numismatics.blaze_banker.tooltip.s: Creates a bank account in the Banker's name, useful for sharing an account with multiple people. You can assign a _Bank Card_ to the banker by placing it in the appropriate slot.
block.numismatics.brass_depositor.toolti: _Shift click_ the _top_ to configure, _right click_ to pay the given amount either with either the card in your hand or the coins in your inventory, at which point a redstone pulse is emmited.
block.numismatics.creative_vendor.toolti: _Creative_ version of the vendor, once configured will never fill up or run out of stock.
block.numismatics.trusted_block.attempt_: 按住潜行键来破坏此方块
block.numismatics.vendor.tooltip.summary: Allows for the trading of items through player made shops. _Right click_ to trade, or _shift click_ to configure it.
command.numismatics.arguments.enum.inval: 错误：无效的枚举值'%s'. 有效值是: %s
gui.numismatics.vendor.full.named: 销售机已满，联系%s来清空它
gui.numismatics.vendor.insufficient_fund: 资金不足，请联系%s来补充
gui.numismatics.vendor.out_of_stock.name: 缺货，请联系%s来补充
item.numismatics.bank_card.tooltip.summa: _Right Click_ to bind, _shift click_ to clear. Allows Access to the bound Bank Account when used in a _Bank Terminal_, or can be placed in a _Vendor/Depositor_ to automatically collect the coins and add them to the bound account.
item.numismatics.banking_guide.tooltip.s: Use on a _Blaze Burner_ to convert it into a _Blaze Banker_.
item.numismatics.id_card.tooltip.already: 已绑定, 潜行+右键解绑
item.numismatics.id_card.tooltip.summary: _Right Click_ to bind, _shift click_ to clear. Can be placed in the _Trusted Menu_ of many Numismatics blocks to give the bound player access to that block.
